Html:
Hi there !

I successfully integrated GMap.NET in my Forms application, but no am stuck at one point:

I use GMAP to display where a particular dataset was recorded.

The issue:

GMap is blocking the GUI-thread while fetching the map data from the provider. Since I not only display the map but lots of other data aswell that makes the whole app "stumble".

Is there a way to generate the MAP-image without adding the control to the GUI (then I could put the map-generation in a seperate thread)?

 

Regards

 

Carsten
check BigMapMaker test project, it generates map in console application
